sentences.en: Background Antimicrobials are the leading cause of idiosyncratic drug - induced liver injury in most series.
sentences.cn: 在大部分病人中使用抗菌药是导致特殊性药物肝损害的主要原因.

sentences.en: Common adverse reaction has side effect, toxic effect, allergic effect , idiosyncratic reaction and so on.
sentences.cn: 常见的药物不良反应有副作用, 毒性作用, 变态反应, 特异质反应等.

sentences.en: Do you feel million dispatch values you of what respect idiosyncratic?
sentences.cn: 您觉得兆讯看重您哪些方面的特质?

sentences.en: Further, transaction costs, short - sale constraints and information uncertainty cannot account for the role of idiosyncratic risk.
sentences.cn: 而且, 交易成本, 卖空限制和信息不对称不能解释特质风险的作用.

sentences.en: Ge - Beijing dialect, that temper colors and idiosyncratic.
sentences.cn: 葛 — 北京方言, 即脾气各色,古怪.

sentences.en: Her blackboard technique was also extremely idiosyncratic.
sentences.cn: 她写黑板的技巧也别具一格.

sentences.en: His manner was genial and his speech idiosyncratic.
sentences.cn: 他的态度很和蔼,讲起话来有独特的风格.

sentences.en: However , too much fictional, idiosyncratic biography is a distraction and makes your personas less credible.
sentences.cn: 过多的虚构特质的描述,不仅是一种干扰,而且使得你的人物角色的可信度降低.

sentences.en: In fact, modern mobile devices are not idiosyncratic consumer devices.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 现代的移动设备并非特质的消费设备.

sentences.en: In their own idiosyncratic fashion a few writers will always be looking for new departures.
sentences.cn: 一些作家总会以自己别具一格的方式寻找着新的出发点.

sentences.en: Nevertheless, everyone associated with Zhang's idiosyncratic production is acting as if Turandot is coming home.
sentences.cn: 然而, 参与张导独特制作的同仁无不流露《图兰多》似乎是回娘家了.

sentences.en: President Niyazov's extravagant buildings are not a hallmark of his idiosyncratic regime.
sentences.cn: 总统尼亚佐夫修建的奢华建筑反映了他特殊的政治权力.

sentences.en: The real question isn't groupware vs . the intranet. Rather, it's how best to meet idiosyncratic customer needs.
sentences.cn: 真正的问题不是群件对内部网的问题, 而是如何能最好地满足客户的特殊需要.

sentences.en: We all have our own idiosyncratic gestures.
sentences.cn: 我们每个人都有自己特异的姿势.

sentences.en: Yet ask him about his idiosyncratic choices and you'll get stock explanations about good business sense.
sentences.cn: 但是,问他作出这些不同寻常的选择的原因,他会详细解释给你听.

trans.tran_en: If you describe someone's actions or characteristics as idiosyncratic, you mean that they are somewhat unusual
